com.iciql
Interface UpdateColumn

All Known Implementing Classes:
UpdateColumnIncrement, UpdateColumnSet
public interface UpdateColumn

Classes implementing this interface can be used as a declaration in an update statement.

Method Summary
 void appendSQL(SQLStatement stat)
          Append the SQL to the given statement using the given query.
